attributes.action: Change the law to stop forced adoption and only parents can consent to adoption
attributes.additional_details: We are in a country who is unusual in Europe for allowing children to be adopted with out parents consent as quoted by many family court judges and they have already called for this to end but the profit gained by the government from this crime out weighs them acknowledging that this goes on and nothing will change unless we demand it that's our right we can stop this if we all stick together and make our voices heard and protect our children and stop all the corruption going on in the uk courts
attributes.background: Let's make a stand and show the government we don't want this crime to be legal anymore let's make the government listen to us and hear our voices and stop making profit from our children
